hero.title: Automate the Busywork
hero.highlight: Focus on the Work that matters
hero.subtitle: We design and build custom automations that connect your systems end to end — so your business stops running on copy-paste and starts running on autopilot.
hero.ctaHint: Tell us how your day looks right now — We will show you what can be automated first.

paragraphs: We start by listening. We look at your day-to-day work — what’s repetitive, what slows you down, and what you wish would “just happen” on its own.

From there, we map your processes, identify where automation adds the most value, and design clear, maintainable workflows that connect your systems end to end. The goal is simple: dependable automations that give you back hours every week.
Whether it’s syncing your CRM with your inbox, generating reports automatically, or routing support tickets to the right person, everything is built to run reliably and scale with your business.

focus.title: Focus
focus.text: Solving real problems first, then choosing automation that actually supports them.

tools.title: Tools
tools.text: The tools are flexible. I choose and connect whatever fits your stack so everything talks to each other and runs reliably.

style.title: Style
style.text: Clear, maintainable solutions your team can understand, operate and improve over time.

goal.title: Goal
goal.text: Give you and your team more time for high-value work instead of repetitive busy-work.

services.subtitle: Every business is different, but these are the common areas where automation creates the biggest impact.

items.title: Workflow Automation
items.description: Turn repetitive tasks into automated flows. Save hours every week and eliminate human error from routine processes.

items.title: Tool Integration
items.description: Connect your apps so data flows automatically. No more copy-pasting between systems — your tools finally talk to each other.

items.title: Dashboards & Reporting
items.description: See your business at a glance with BI. Automated reports delivered when you need them, with the metrics that matter.

items.title: CRM, Sales & Landing Pages
items.description: Design high-converting landing pages and connect CRM flows. Never let a lead slip through the cracks. Automated follow-ups, lead scoring, and pipeline updates so every opportunity is tracked and actioned.

items.title: Operations & Admin
items.description: From invoicing to file organization to client onboarding — automate the admin work that eats your productive hours.

items.title: Maintenance & Support
items.description: Proactive monitoring and ongoing support to keep your automations healthy, reliable, and aligned with how your business evolves.

playbooks.subtitle: Examples of what we can build together — we'll adapt everything to your tools and workflows.

items.title: Lead → CRM → Follow-Up
items.summary: Capture leads automatically and trigger personalized follow-ups.
items.detail: When a lead comes in from your website, form, or ad, it automatically goes into your CRM, gets tagged, and triggers a personalized email sequence. No manual data entry, no forgotten follow-ups.

items.title: Automated Client Onboarding
items.summary: Welcome new clients with zero manual steps.
items.detail: New client signs up? They automatically get a welcome email, their folder is created, their project is set up in your workspace, and your team gets notified. First impressions, handled.

items.title: Morning KPI Snapshot
items.summary: Daily email with your key metrics, automatically.
items.detail: Wake up to an email showing yesterday's sales, support tickets, website visits, and whatever else matters. Your data sources are pulled together automatically and delivered to you — you just drink your coffee.

items.title: Invoices & Payment Updates
items.summary: Track payments and notify your team automatically.
items.detail: When an invoice is paid, your accounting software updates, your CRM marks the client as active, and your team gets notified. Overdue? Automatic reminders go out.

items.title: Smart Support Ticket Routing
items.summary: Get tickets to the right person, instantly.
items.detail: Support request comes in? It's automatically categorized, assigned to the right team member based on skill or availability, and the customer gets an instant acknowledgment.

items.title: Smart Meeting Scheduling
items.summary: Let prospects and clients book time on your calendar automatically with reminders built in.
items.detail: Prospects or clients want to meet? They pick a slot that works for them, your calendar is updated, reminders go out automatically, and follow-ups are queued — without anyone emailing or texting back and forth.

process.subtitle: A simple, transparent process from first call to launch — and beyond.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We start with a quick call to understand your tools, workflows, and the tasks that slow you down.

steps.title: Concept & Design
steps.description: We map your processes and design simple, visual flows showing exactly what will be automated.

steps.title: Build & Integrate
steps.description: We turn the blueprint into working automations, connect your systems, and make sure your data flows smoothly between the tools you already use.

steps.title: Test & Refine
steps.description: We test with real data, catch edge cases, and make sure everything runs smoothly.

steps.title: Launch & Support
steps.description: We go live with confidence and stay available to adjust as your business grows and changes.

quote.text: We finally have automations we can trust. Our team spends less time chasing tasks and more time on the work that actually moves the business forward.
quote.name: Carin van Mol

cta.title: Partner With us on Your Next Automation Project

cta.secondary: Let's talk about where automation would help most.
